content: US Foods Holding Corp   a U.S. private equity-owned food distributor  raised $1.02 billion on Wednesday in this year's second-largest U.S. initial public offering thus far  as new stock market flotations pick up pace. | Video
name: US Foods Holding Corp
title: US Foods raises $1 billion in year's second largest IPO
